title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Withdrawal of the United
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Withdrawal of the United 
Kingdom from the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act 2020 
(Construction Products – Market Surveillance) Regulations 2020. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 23 December 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited withdrawal united kingdom european union (consequential provisions) act 2020 (construction product - market surveillance) regulation 2020 (2) regulation shall come operation 23 december 2020

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 2. Dublin City Council is prescribed as a competent authority for the
text_raw:
2. Dublin City Council is prescribed as a competent authority for the 
purposes of carrying out the functions of a market surveillance authority under 
the European Union (Construction Products) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 225 of 
2013).
text_norm: 2 dublin city council prescribed competent authority purpose carrying function market surveillance authority european union (construction products) regulation 2013 (s.i no 225 2013)

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: 3. All construction products to which the Construction Products Regulation
text_raw:
3. All construction products to which the Construction Products Regulation 
applies, placed on the market or, as the case may be, made available on the 
market, in the State, are prescribed as construction products in respect of which 
Dublin City Council, prescribed under Regulation 2 as a competent authority, 
shall carry out the functions referred to in that Regulation 2 of a market 
surveillance authority. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 December, 2020. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [682] 3

title: Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of 2020), hereby make the following regulations:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These regulations prescribe Dublin City Council as a competent authority for the 
purposes of carrying out the functions of a market surveillance authority under 
the European Union (Construction Products) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 225 of 
2013). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [682]
